item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Matt. This is a blog to document my homebrewing. I like brewing a wide range of styles, but some of my focuses are flavorful low alcohol beers, IPAs, and lots of mixed fermentation weirdness. I’m from the Baltimore area and I confess to being a bit of a Sapwood Cellars fanboy. I encourage you to ask any questions in the comments on this site. If you would rather email me directly please write to matt@wallflowerbrewing.com
